<div class="section" id="service-operations">
<h1>Service Operations<a class="headerlink" href="#service-operations" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h1>
<div class="section" id="list-buckets">
<h2>List Buckets<a class="headerlink" href="#list-buckets" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<p><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">GET</span> <span class="pre">/</span></tt> returns a list of buckets created by the user making the request. <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">GET</span> <span class="pre">/</span></tt> only
returns buckets created by an authenticated user. You cannot make an anonymous request.</p>
<div class="section" id="syntax">
<h3>Syntax<a class="headerlink" href="#syntax" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<div class="highlight-python"><pre>GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: cname.domain.com

Authorization: AWS {access-key}:{hash-of-header-and-secret}</pre>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="response-entities">
<h3>Response Entities<a class="headerlink" href="#response-entities" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<table border="1" class="docutils">
<colgroup>
<col width="26%">
<col width="12%">
<col width="61%">
</colgroup>
<thead valign="bottom">
<tr class="row-odd"><th class="head">Name</th>
<th class="head">Type</th>
<th class="head">Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody valign="top">
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Buckets</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>Container for list of buckets.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Bucket</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>Container for bucket information.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Name</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>Bucket name.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">CreationDate</span></tt></td>
<td>Date</td>
<td>UTC time when the bucket was created.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">ListAllMyBucketsResult</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container for the result.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Owner</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container for the bucket owner&#8217;s <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">ID</span></tt> and <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">DisplayName</span></tt>.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">ID</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The bucket owner&#8217;s ID.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">DisplayName</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The bucket owner&#8217;s display name.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
